original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): The Constitutional Council is set to convene today.

Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana says the Constitutional Council will convene to discuss a number of matters including the approval to extend the tenure of Inspector General of Police C.D. Wickremeratne.
Wickremeratne's position as IGP was extended by three months recently.
The Secretary to the President subsequently forwarded his name to the Constitutional Council.
Mrs. India Inc contest in Sri Lanka: Nominees for “Mrs. Beyond Giving” join with ‘Meal to Heal’.
Sinopec commences importation and distribution of fuel in Sri Lanka
14-hour water cut in several parts of Colombo on Saturday (15)
